Introduction to Philosophy

Jun 16, 2021 George Belic Jun 16, 2021 George Belic

:watch

:watch

\[\begin{align*} \Huge\Phi\iota\lambda\omicron\sigma\omicron\phi\iota\alpha &= \text{love of wisdom}\\ \end{align*}\]

Description

This is an introduction to philosophy. It covers the central problems of the central subfields: ethics, philosophy of religion, metaphysics, epistemology.

Lectures

Methodology
Literature and Greek TragedySophocles. Antigone
Film: Antigone (1961)
Religion
Science, Pseudo-ScienceFeynman - Lectures on Physics
SEP - Scientific Method
Philosophical MethodPlato, Euthyphro
Russell, Bertrand. The Value of Philosophy
Plato. Apology.
Ethics
Relativism and Post-Modernism
Egoism and Hedonism
UtilitarianismJohn Stuart Mill, Utilitarianism
DeontologyKant, I. Critique
Velleman. Outline of Kant's Ethics
Virtue EthicsAristotle, Nicomachean Ethics - Books I and II
Political Philosophy
LibertarianismAnarchy, State and Utopia.
Socialism
Marx. K. Communist Manifesto
LiberalismRawls, J. A Theory of Justice
Freewill and Determinism
LiberalismCampbell, C.A. In Defence of Free Will
Hard-DeterminismHolbach. Determinism.
CompatibilismAyer, A. J. Language, Truth and Logic (excerpt)
Frankfurt, H. Alternative Possibilities and Moral Responsibility
Philosophy of Mind
DualismDescartes, R. Meditations II.
BehaviorismSkinner, B. F. Verbal Behavior
Chomsky, N. Review
Identity TheorySmart, J. J.
Functionalism
Can Computers Think?Turing, A. "Can machines Think?"
Searle, J. "Chinese Room Experiment"
Philosophy of Religion
Ontological ArgumentSt. Anselm.
Kant, I.
Cosmological Argument
Design ArgumentPaley, W. Natural Theology.
Hume, D.
The Problem of EvilHume, D.
Epistemology
SkepticismPyrrho. Outlines of Skepticism.
External World SkepticismDescartes, R. Meditations I, II
The Problem of InductionHume, D. Enquiry
Metaphysics
RealismRussell, B. Appearance and Reality.
Locke, J. Essay on Human Understanding.
IdealismBerkeley, G.
Quantum Mechanics and Anti-Realism
PragmatismPeirce, C. Pragmaticism.
TruthBertand, Russell. Problems of Philosophy. Truth.

Furhter Readings and Viewings

    • Feynman, Richard. Lectures on Physics.
  • Ethics
    • Michael Sandel, Justice: What’s the right thing to do?
  • Political Philosophy
    • sadfasdf
  • Freewill
    • asdfasd

    • On God’s Existence: Bertrand Russell (Agnostism) vs Copleston (Theism)
